alert_module.description: Generates alerts on system failures, SLA violations, or abnormal activity.

requirements.REQ-ALT-1: System sends alerts via Email and SMS
requirements.REQ-ALT-2: Alerts configurable by severity (Critical, Major, Minor)
requirements.REQ-ALT-3: Operations-User can configure thresholds per NCS
requirements.REQ-ALT-5: Escalation rules supported (if not resolved in time, escalate to higher authority)
